SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

Class Card

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
KingdomCard, StarterCard
public class Card extends Object
The base class of all playing cards. Each card has two faces (sides), and the player can choose to place the card on the playing board with one of the two face visible. Each card has a numerical identifier.
